Question: Do you feel that you are a normal drinker?  (?normal? MEANS that you drink a similar amount to the amount most other people that you know drink. If you think you drink less than what most other people drink, this is also considered a ?normal drinker? in the context of this question.)

Have you ever gotten into trouble at work because of drinking
Have you ever lost a job because of drinking
